channel.title: Projects on mjt
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on mjt

item.title: yt
item.description: yt is an open-source python package for analyzing and visualizing volumetric data.

item.title: Crops in Silico
item.description: Crops in Silico is an integrative and multi-scale modeling platform to combine modeling efforts toward the generation of virtual crops, open and accessible to the global community.

item.title: Whole Tale
item.description: Whole Tale is an initiative to build a scalable, open source, web-based, multi-user platform for reproducible research.
